location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Translation of a letter from Mahomed Neuby Kaun [Muḥammad Nabī Khān] to William Bruce

physicalDescription.extent: The letter is an enclosure to another letter found on folios 112-113.

mods.abstract: The letter is requesting that Mahomed Neuby Kaun's [Muḥammad Nabī Khān] pension be paid to Aga Mahomed Tudeer (also spelt Aga Mahomed Kaudee).
